sentences.en: A new supersonic combustion ramjet, or scramjet, engine gets put through its paces at a NASA research center in a ground-based test that simulated Mach 5 conditions in 2008.
sentences.cn: 在美国宇航局研究中心，一个新的超音速燃烧冲压喷气发动机（scramjet）通过了模拟2008年5月5日环境的地面测试。

sentences.en: Computations are done on flow configurations that resemble the reaction zone in the scramjet combustor flows.
sentences.cn: 本文通过数值模拟得到了超燃冲压发动机燃烧室化学反应流流场的流动结构.

sentences.en: Earlier this week, the Air Force announced that the X-51 WaveRider, a wingless scramjet, would make its first hypersonic flight.
sentences.cn: 本周初，美国空军宣布，超音速燃烧冲压发动机驱动的X-51“驭波者”将进行其首次超音速飞行。

sentences.en: NASA built the X43A under a ＄250 million program to develop and test an exotic type of engine called a supersoniccombustion3 ramjet4, or scramjet.
sentences.cn: 美国航空航天局为建造X43A耗资2.5亿美元，用于开发和测试一种新型的引擎，叫做超音速燃烧冲压式喷气引擎(简称scramjet)。

sentences.en: Scramjet nozzle was installed at the exit of the combustor.
sentences.cn: 尾喷管直接安装在模型发动机的燃烧室出口.

sentences.en: This paper summarized the latestand foreign development status of scramjet engine andthe key technologies.
sentences.cn: 超燃冲压发动机技术是一项新型的、具有广阔发展前景的推进技术.

trans.tran_en: a type of powerful engine that can make an aircraft fly at more than ten times the speed of sound
